mapper.select: SELECT board.boardTitle, board.boardProPrice, location.locationName, kategory.kategoryName, state.stateName, board.boardHitCnt,board.boardLike, file.filePath, board.boardContents,board.boardUserId FROM board board JOIN location location ON location.locationNum = board.boardUserCheck JOIN kategory kategory ON kategory.kategoryNum = board.boardKategory JOIN file file ON file.fileBoardNum = board.boardNum JOIN state state ON board.boardProState = state.stateNum WHERE board.boardUserId = 'ㅊㅊㅊ' AND board.deleted_yn='N';
mapper.insert: insert into board (boardTitle, boardKategory, boardUserId, boardContents, boardDate, boardProPrice) values(#{boardTitle},#{boardKategory},'ㅊㅊㅊ',#{boardContents},now(),#{boardProPrice});
